summary: The Zangetsu from the anime series Bleach
descriptionHtml:
The Zangetsu
=============

Today I bring you the Zangetsu based upon the anime series Bleach to Skyrim!

This Zangetsu can be crafted from the Ebony category at any forge and enchantable/improvable!


Console Spawning:

As mods have a dynamic Item ID I can not provide the Item ID, although here is a tip to find it.

Open console and type: Help zangetsu
After this you should get the Zangetsu Item ID
Now you can spawn it like you would with any other weapon/item.

Stats:

Weight: 20
Damage: 45
Value: 2200

Mirrors:

Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=221462558
Gamebanana: http://skyrim.gamebanana.com/skins/131690
author: Rafael De Jongh
